Here are more background information problem:

There are 2 crawl job involv=
ed, each one have 3 checkpoint directory.

The first crawl job I started ab=
out 5 days ago. I have 3 checkpoints 
for the first crawl job.

I then term=
inate the first job, started the 2nd crawl based on the 
checkpoint 3 of th=
e first crawl job. The 2nd crawl also have 3 
checkpoints over the past few=
 days.

Now that I check the consistency of bdbje-log directory and their 
=
bdbje-log-manifest.txt. All 3 checkpoints of the first crawl are 
consisten=
t. None of the checkpoints of the 2nd crawl is consistent.

I'm planning to=
 start another job based on checkpoint 3 of the 1st 
crawl. And check if th=
e checkpoints are good for this new job.

cheers,
-joe
